DOC.detailed_description: GL2702 GLARS-NF1 tablet control release formation make GL Pharm Tech
DOC.criteria: Over 50 year old , BPH diagnosted , Adult Male Subject IPSS ≥ 13 point PSA < 4ng/mL 5ml/sec < Qmax ≤ 15ml/sec Prostatic cancer 250ml < PVR ALT AST > 2 time ( Upper Normal Range ) Total Bilirubin > 1.5 time ( Upper Normal Range ) Treated αadrenalin receptor blocker within 2weeks screen Treated 5AlphaReductase Inhibitor within 6 month screen Treated phytotherapy within 2weeks screen Treated Anabolic Steroid within 6 month screen
